name: Lips
title: Gcloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
Features
Lips
description:
Lips

The landmarks of the lips in the features of a face.

See Features and Face.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"
face = image.face

lips = face.features.lips

lips.top
#=> #<Landmark (x: 228.54768, y: 143.2952, z: -5.6550336)>
